articles.description: Oleksandr Usyk defeats Briton Tyson Fury to retain his unified heavyweight world titles and prove his status as a generational great in another close points win in Saudi Arabia.
articles.title: Fury vs Usyk 2: Ukrainian outpoints Briton to retain unified heavyweight world titles

articles.description: Pep Guardiola says Manchester City - who are on the joint worst run of form in the Premier League after a sixth defeat in eight games - 'have to find a way' to win again.
articles.title: Man City lose to Aston Villa: Pep Guardiola says struggling champions 'have to find a way' to win again

articles.description: Tyson Fury refuses to accept he lost his rematch against unified heavyweight champion Oleksandr Usyk and claims the judges gave him a "Christmas gift".
articles.title: Fury vs Usyk 2: Tyson Fury unhappy with scorecards

articles.description: A tearful Luke Littler almost hits a nine-darter as he starts his bid for the PDC World Championship title with a dramatic 3-1 win over Ryan Meikle.
articles.title: PDC World Darts Championship: Luke Littler almost hits nine-darter in opening win

articles.description: Former world champions Lennox Lewis, Tony Bellew and Anthony Crolla react to Oleksandr Usyk's unanimous points win over Tyson Fury.
articles.title: Fury vs Usyk 2: Lennox Lewis, Tony Bellew, Frank Warren react

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Barcelona vs Atlético Madrid in the Spanish La Liga
articles.title: Barcelona vs Atlético Madrid: Spanish La Liga stats & head-to-head

articles.description: After watching Gabriel Jesus score a hat-trick against Crystal Palace in midweek, Arsenal boss Mikel Arteta says the striker has rediscovered his best form.
articles.title: 'I know I can score' - Is Gabriel Jesus the answer to Arsenal's striker dilemma?

articles.description: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta says he is "pretty worried" about Bukayo Saka after the England winger went off injured against Crystal Palace.
articles.title: Arsenal: Mikel Arteta 'pretty worried' about Bukayo Saka injury against Crystal Palace

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Aston Villa vs Manchester City in the Premier League
articles.title: Aston Villa vs Manchester City: Premier League preview, team news, stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Former England manager Gareth Southgate explains why he chose Adele's Someone Like You as one of his tracks on the latest episode of Desert Island Discs.
articles.title: Adele, England & Man Utd: Gareth Southgate's Desert Island Discs
